title: How to Create a Folder on the PSP Memory Stick

steps.headline: Connect Your PSP to Computer with a USB cable.
On your Desktop or at the start menu go to My Computer by double clicking or clicking once and pressing "Enter" Key on the Keyboard.
When My Computer Window appears on the screen, go to the removable disk by double clicking or clicking once and pressing "Enter" Key on the Keyboard.
steps.description: In that disk you will see many folders at the root of your memory stick, by right clicking you will see a drop down menu will appear.

steps.headline: In the menu that appears you will see many options,there will be one option that would be named as 'New' click that option.
steps.description: By clicking the 'New' option you will see many icons will appear at the top of that menu there will a folder icon named as 'Folder' click that.

steps.headline: When you have clicked the folder icon, then at the root of your memory stick you will see a folder icon highlighted with blue color and named as New Folder.
Now you have to press the key backspace in icon name area which will be highlighted with blue so you can write the name of your desired folder.
When you have written the name of your desired folder, you wanted to create at PSP, then press enter key ate the keyboard, the folder will be created.
steps.description: That is it. So simple, hope you love those steps. Thanks a lot for reading.

text: Connect Your PSP to Computer with a USB cable.  On your Desktop or at the start menu go to My Computer by double clicking or clicking once and pressing "Enter" Key on the Keyboard.  When My Computer Window appears on the screen, go to the removable disk by double clicking or clicking once and pressing "Enter" Key on the Keyboard. In that disk you will see many folders at the root of your memory stick, by right clicking you will see a drop down menu will appear. In the menu that appears you will see many options,there will be one option that would be named as 'New' click that option. By clicking the 'New' option you will see many icons will appear at the top of that menu there will a folder icon named as 'Folder' click that. When you have clicked the folder icon, then at the root of your memory stick you will see a folder icon highlighted with blue color and named as New Folder.  Now you have to press the key backspace in icon name area which will be highlighted with blue so you can write the name of your desired folder.  When you have written the name of your desired folder, you wanted to create at PSP, then press enter key ate the keyboard, the folder will be created. That is it. So simple, hope you love those steps. Thanks a lot for reading.
